edge_1: Universal Pictures is the distributor for the adaptation of Fifty Shades of Grey.
edge_2: Universal Pictures is the distributor for the adaptation of Fifty Shades Darker, which is set to be released in 2016.
edge_3: Fifty Shades Darker and Fifty Shades Freed will both be adapted into films.

edge_1: Universal Pictures is the distributor for the adaptation of Fifty Shades of Grey.
edge_2: Universal Pictures is the distributor for the adaptation of Fifty Shades Darker, which is set to be released in 2016.
edge_3: The script for the sequel was confirmed in July 2015. In November 2015, it was announced that Fifty Shades Darker and its third film, Fifty Shades Freed, would be shot back-to-back in 2016.
